name: Guardian Northwest Title & Escrow

yelp_reviews.author: Pamela M.
yelp_reviews.review: Wonderful customer service and staff is very professional.  Handled our escrow seamlessly and were always available to answer questions and offer assistance.  Recommend this company highly.

address: 3800 Byron Ave 140 Bellingham Wa 98229 Bellingham, WA 98229
